name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-js-modern-calendar
title: Modern Calendar
shortDescription: This is a modern web part built on the GA version of the SharePoint Framework demonstrating how to build a custom web part with a calendar capabilities in it.
longDescription: This is a modern web part built on the GA version of the SharePoint Framework demonstrating how to build a custom web part with a calendar capabilities in it.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
